title: Avocado and Mango Salad
short_description: This refreshing and light salad is the perfect side dish for any summer meal. The combination of creamy avocado and sweet mango is simply delightful. It only takes a few minutes to prepare, making it the ideal recipe for a quick and healthy dish.
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted, and diced
1 ripe mango, peeled, pitted, and diced

steps.title: Prepare the Ingredients
steps.description: Peel, pit, and dice the avocado and mango. Thinly slice the red onion and chop the fresh cilantro.

steps.title: Mix the Salad
steps.description: In a bowl, combine the diced avocado, mango, sliced red onion, and chopped cilantro. Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice, then toss gently to mix. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Transfer the salad to a serving dish and enjoy as a delicious and refreshing side dish.
